name: アザーライフ アザードリームス
summary: Azure Dreams, released in Japan as Other Life: Azure Dreams (アザーライフ アザードリームス Azā Raifu Azā Dorīmusu), is a PlayStation video game developed by Konami and was originally released in Japan on November 13, 1997. A stripped down version was later released on the Game Boy Color. A semi-sequel, Tao's Adventure: Curse of the Demon Seal, was released on the Nintendo DS in 2005.
